heroDescription: FreeUniArcade was born with one goal: to make classic and retro games accessible to everyone. No sign-ups. No payments. Just fun and nostalgia.

snake.title: Snake
snake.description: The classic snake game. Eat food and grow without crashing.
snake.desktopControls: Desktop: Use arrow keys or WASD
snake.mobileControls: Mobile: Use the D-pad or swipe

flappy.title: Flappy Bird
flappy.description: Fly between the pipes without crashing. Press space or click to fly.

pong.title: Pong
pong.description: The classic Pong game. Compete against the machine and win by reaching 10 points.
pong.desktopControls: Desktop: Use arrow keys ↑↓ or W/S to move the paddle
pong.mobileControls: Mobile: Touch and drag on the screen

minesweeper.title: Minesweeper
minesweeper.description: Find all mines without exploding. Left click to reveal, right click to flag.

tetris.title: Tetris
tetris.description: Align the pieces and complete lines to score points.

sudoku.title: Sudoku
sudoku.description: Complete the grid with numbers from 1 to 9 without repeating.

donateDescription: If you enjoy FreeUniArcade and want to support the project, you can make a donation through PayPal. Your contribution helps keep the site running and add new games.
donateNote: Donations are completely optional. FreeUniArcade will remain free for everyone.
